attributes.action: Remove requirement for EWS1 certificate for buildings without cladding
attributes.additional_details: It is crippling the housing market. No mortgage can be obtained for any home in a block of flats, preventing millions from moving home or obtaining a remortgage. Any sale with a flat in a chain is breaking down costing the economy millions and leaving these home owners stranded
attributes.background: Allow existing building specifications to be used to determine which buildings actually require an EWS1 certificate. Currently legislation is opaque and mortgage lenders have a blanket approach to flats in purpose built blocks, requiring an EWS1 for any flat/apartment in order to grant a mortgage
